name: Scholarships
description: Brighterly offers a math scholarship to help young learners build a strong foundation in math, boost their confidence, and learn from top-tier tutors who use interactive, personalized teaching methods. Winners receive $500 in cash plus six months of top-designed math lessons, catered to their unique learning styles and helping them build the skills they need to succeed. Apply for the Brighterly Scholarship and help your kid achieve their full math potential!
